response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to both you and us. Considering the exceptional quality and unparalleled benefits this product offers, we are extending an initial offer to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This is a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a significant discount. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer within the next 48 hours. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1100000}
